job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a software engineer who loves designing, building, and maintaining software. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies in the security field and contribute to protect IBM's customers from cyber threats at scale.

   As part of your job, you will be part of the integration team, working on existing and new microservices. You will be involved in the design decisions of backend service components, you will develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready. You will be responsible for those components. You will also be involved in writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component. You will work in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard., Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer - Python

We are looking for a software engineer who loves designing, building, and maintaining software. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies in the security field and contribute to protect IBM's customers from cyber threats at scale.

   As part of your job, you will be part of the integration team, working on existing and new microservices. You will be involved in the design decisions of backend service components, you will develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready. You will be responsible for those components. You will also be involved in writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component. You will work in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard., Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks, microservices, and CI/CD pipelines within the security domain. While it mentions 'cutting edge technologies in the security field', it lacks any specific mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related concepts, which are central to the ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles. Therefore, it does not fit the criteria for a technical AI role and is classified as Ambiguous.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'software engineer who loves designing, building, and maintaining software', 'working on existing and new microservices', 'design decisions of backend service components', and 'develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready'.
The role involves working with microservices, which are a common architectural pattern in modern software development.
job_tasks.phrase: working on existing and new microservices

job_tasks.justification: The candidate will be involved in the architectural decisions for backend components.
job_tasks.phrase: design decisions of backend service components

job_tasks.justification: The core responsibility includes developing and testing applications to ensure they are ready for production.
job_tasks.phrase: develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready

job_tasks.justification: The job involves writing CI/CD pipelines, which is a key aspect of operations engineering for deploying and managing software.
job_tasks.phrase: writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component

job_tasks.justification: The description highlights a 'collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard', indicating the importance of teamwork and open communication.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard

soft_skills.phrase: collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard
